name: Desolate Sands
description: Explore an Ancient Egyptian tomb, Climb And solve puzzles to discover the mysteries within.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-6400/ AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space
